s: The Keurig K3500 makes a good cup of coffee. It has great features and overall works well. However, its sleep mode is too aggressive. It goes to sleep after a few minutes of inactivity. This puts the display asleep as well. To wake it up, you have to touch and hold the screen until it wakes up.
